modName: More Morrowind Like Glass Weapons Texture
descriptionHtml:
NOTE: I have now released newer version that comes with both armor and weapons, I\'m going to make uptades to that file and let this be. I\'m not going to delete this file if someone likes this better. If you like this file you may want to see the newer. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15300]LINK to the NEWER file[/url]

This retexture mod replaces vanilla glass weapons with more Morrowind like color. 

Hope you enjoy!

Note: If you have donwloaded this mod before 3rd UPDATE (date 4.12.2012), downloading the main file again should update everything.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3. UPDATE 4.12.2012 Merged all files so you now have to download just one file for everything to work. Also fixed conflicts with Chillrend.
2. UPDATE 3.22.2012: Fixed bow\'s texture.
1. UPDATE 2.22.2012: Bow\'s retexture didn\'t loaded correctly, fixed.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you are interested in my other mod \"More Morrowind Like Glass Armor\", you can see how these weapons look with them, look links below. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installing
Drag and drop \"textures\" folder to \"skyrim\\data\"
For Bow fix optional file see the readme inside


Uninstalling
Delete \"glass\" folder from \"skyrim\\Data\\textures\\weapons\"

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Links:
More Morrowind Like Glass Weapons with More Morrowind Like Glass Armor pics:
[url=http://i.imgur.com/TtN4K.jpg]1.[/url]
[url=http://i.imgur.com/xrwep.jpg]2.[/url]

 [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4859]
More Morrowind Like Glass Armor Texture[/url]
author: JESSETIN3
